P.title: Will Europa be the first place humanity will discover extraterrestrial life, if it is discovered before 2045?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if humanity discovers convincing evidence of life on Europa before January 1, 2045 and does so before detecting extra terrestrial life anywhere else in the universe. If extraterrestrial life is found convincingly elsewhere prior to on Europa, this question will resolve as No. If no extraterrestrial life is found before 2045, this question will be Annulled.
Note: extraterrestrial life must be (a) living currently and (b) highly unlikely to be a result of contamination by Earth spacecraft. This leaves open the possibility of life transported from Earth via other non-human-engineered means.

Q.title: Will we find life on Mars by 2050?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if prominent, highly respected scientific organizations announce that humans have discovered unambiguous evidence of current or past life on Mars, independent of life that was carried from Earth to Mars via human-designed missions.
If this has not happened before January 1, 2050, this question will resolve as No

P_and_Q.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) humanity discovers extraterrestrial life on Europa before 2045 and (b) unambiguous evidence of life on Mars is found before 2050?
P_and_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following occur:
(a) Humanity discovers convincing evidence of life on Europa before January 1, 2045, and does so before detecting extraterrestrial life anywhere else in the universe. If extraterrestrial life is found convincingly elsewhere prior to on Europa, this part will resolve as No. If no extraterrestrial life is found before 2045, this part will be Annulled. Note: extraterrestrial life must be (a) living currently and (b) highly unlikely to be a result of contamination by Earth spacecraft. This leaves open the possibility of life transported from Earth via other non-human-engineered means.
(b) Prominent, highly respected scientific organizations announce that humans have discovered unambiguous evidence of current or past life on Mars, independent of life that was carried from Earth to Mars via human-designed missions, before January 1, 2050. If this has not happened before January 1, 2050, this part will resolve as No.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Europa be the first place humanity will discover extraterrestrial life, if it is discovered before 2045? (b) We find life on Mars by 2050?
P_or_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if either of the following occurs:
(a) Humanity discovers convincing evidence of life on Europa before January 1, 2045 and does so before detecting extraterrestrial life anywhere else in the universe. If extraterrestrial life is found convincingly elsewhere prior to on Europa, this component will resolve as No. If no extraterrestrial life is found before 2045, this component will be Annulled. Note: extraterrestrial life must be (a) living currently and (b) highly unlikely to be a result of contamination by Earth spacecraft. This leaves open the possibility of life transported from Earth via other non-human-engineered means.
(b) Prominent, highly respected scientific organizations announce that humans have discovered unambiguous evidence of current or past life on Mars, independent of life that was carried from Earth to Mars via human-designed missions. If this has not happened before January 1, 2050, this component will resolve as No.

P.title: Will US life expectancy at birth for both sexes fall below 75 years before 2040?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if, at any time between January 1, 2020 to January 1, 2040, US life expectancy at birth (average for both sexes) is less than 75 years, according to the CDC, World Health Organization, or the United Nations. An official statement by any one of those organizations is sufficient to resolve the question

Q.title: Will there be a global thermonuclear war by 2070?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if there is an armed conflict before January 1, 2070 where either of the following conditions are true:
Three countries each detonate at least 10 nuclear devices of at least 10 kiloton yield outside of their own territory
Two countries each detonate at least 50 nuclear devices of at least 10 kiloton yield outside of their own territory.
These conditions are chosen to set aside a two-party regional nuclear war, say between India and Pakistan, or Israel and an adversary, or the UK and France, as disastrous as that would be.
As with many questions with a positive-resolution condition that may preclude being awarded points on Metaculus, predictors are enjoined to predict in good faith, as points will not be awarded until 2070 anyway

P_and_Q.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) US life expectancy at birth for both sexes fall below 75 years before 2040 and (b) there be a global thermonuclear war by 2070?
P_and_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met:
(a) At any time between January 1, 2020 to January 1, 2040, US life expectancy at birth (average for both sexes) is less than 75 years, according to the CDC, World Health Organization, or the United Nations. An official statement by any one of those organizations is sufficient to resolve the question.
(b) There is an armed conflict before January 1, 2070 where either of the following conditions are true:
- Three countries each detonate at least 10 nuclear devices of at least 10 kiloton yield outside of their own territory.
- Two countries each detonate at least 50 nuclear devices of at least 10 kiloton yield outside of their own territory.
These conditions are chosen to set aside a two-party regional nuclear war, say between India and Pakistan, or Israel and an adversary, or the UK and France, as disastrous as that would be.
As with many questions with a positive-resolution condition that may preclude being awarded points on Metaculus, predictors are enjoined to predict in good faith, as points will not be awarded until 2070 anyway.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) US life expectancy at birth for both sexes fall below 75 years before 2040? (b) A global thermonuclear war by 2070?
P_or_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if either of the following occurs:
(a) US life expectancy at birth (average for both sexes) falls below 75 years at any time between January 1, 2020 to January 1, 2040, according to the CDC, World Health Organization, or the United Nations. An official statement by any one of those organizations is sufficient to resolve the question.
(b) There is an armed conflict before January 1, 2070 where either of the following conditions are true:
- Three countries each detonate at least 10 nuclear devices of at least 10 kiloton yield outside of their own territory.
- Two countries each detonate at least 50 nuclear devices of at least 10 kiloton yield outside of their own territory.
These conditions are chosen to set aside a two-party regional nuclear war, say between India and Pakistan, or Israel and an adversary, or the UK and France, as disastrous as that would be.
As with many questions with a positive-resolution condition that may preclude being awarded points on Metaculus, predictors are enjoined to predict in good faith, as points will not be awarded until 2070 anyway.

P.title: Will there be a "World War Three" before 2050?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if, at any time between January 1, 2019 and January 1, 2050, both of these conditions are true:
There is a military conflict involving countries representing in totality at least 30% of world GDP in PPP or 50% of world population in any year in which the conflict is ongoing.
At least 10 million people (civillians or military personnel) have been killed in the conflict.
[see edit history in the fine print]
Fine Print
PPP will may be determined from the following sources, in order of precedence:
IMF
World Bank
United Nations
CIA
[2022-03-24]: Edited to clarify that "world GDP" will be determined in PPP for condition 1 .
[2021-11-24]: Edited to clarify the time constraints.
(Edit 1/16/19 to remove third "described as WWIII" criterion.)

Q.title: Will the price of water on the NQH20 hit $2,500 (2021 USD) per acre-foot by 2050?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve positively if the price of water hits $2500, adjusted for inflation to 2021 USD, on the NQH20 by 2050-01-01, 00:00 UTC. This question resolves negatively if the price of water does not hit $2500 by that date, and it resolves ambiguously if the NQH20 or a similar exchange doesn't continuously track California water prices up until 2050

P_and_Q.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) a "World War Three" before 2050 and (b) the price of water on the NQH20 hit $2,500 (2021 USD) per acre-foot by 2050?
P_and_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met:
(a) There is a military conflict involving countries representing in totality at least 30% of world GDP in PPP or 50% of world population in any year in which the conflict is ongoing, and at least 10 million people (civilians or military personnel) have been killed in the conflict, at any time between January 1, 2019 and January 1, 2050.
(b) The price of water hits $2500, adjusted for inflation to 2021 USD, on the NQH20 by 2050-01-01, 00:00 UTC. This question resolves negatively if the price of water does not hit $2500 by that date, and it resolves ambiguously if the NQH20 or a similar exchange doesn't continuously track California water prices up until 2050.

Fine Print
PPP will may be determined from the following sources, in order of precedence:
IMF
World Bank
United Nations
CIA
[2022-03-24]: Edited to clarify that "world GDP" will be determined in PPP for condition 1.
[2021-11-24]: Edited to clarify the time constraints.
(Edit 1/16/19 to remove third "described as WWIII" criterion.)

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur by 2050: (a) a "World War Three" (b) the price of water on the NQH20 hit $2,500 (2021 USD) per acre-foot?
P_or_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if either of the following occurs:
(a) A "World War Three" occurs before 2050. This will be true if, at any time between January 1, 2019 and January 1, 2050, both of these conditions are true:
- There is a military conflict involving countries representing in totality at least 30% of world GDP in PPP or 50% of world population in any year in which the conflict is ongoing.
- At least 10 million people (civilians or military personnel) have been killed in the conflict.
PPP may be determined from the following sources, in order of precedence:
IMF, World Bank, United Nations, CIA.
(b) The price of water hits $2500, adjusted for inflation to 2021 USD, on the NQH20 by 2050-01-01, 00:00 UTC. This question resolves negatively if the price of water does not hit $2500 by that date, and it resolves ambiguously if the NQH20 or a similar exchange doesn't continuously track California water prices up until 2050.
